abstract: In the United States an "American Idol"-style competition reality series from Jennifer Lopez and Marc Anthony will premiere next year on Univision.
snippet: In the United States an "American Idol"-style competition reality series from Jennifer Lopez and Marc Anthony will premiere next year on Univision.
lead_paragraph: The marriage may be ending but the show goes on for Jennifer Lopez and Marc Anthony. The duo has sold their television series "¡Q'Viva! The Chosen" to 21 broadcast networks internationally. On Wednesday, the first three broadcast network deals were announced by the show's producer, XIX Entertainment, the company of Simon Fuller, the creator of "American Idol."

headline.main: Jennifer Lopez's Talent Show Finds U.S. Home on Univision
